name: Quartermaster (itch)
description:
“Play as the real heroes of any war, the supply chain workers. Set up on a journey of a quartermaster, traveling battlefront to battlefront to supply his comrades in an ongoing war. Use all features of his enchanted wagon to reach maximum efficiency, speed, and quality.”

Features

Building Logistics

Building System that works on a grid. You can purchase new structures from the building menu and place them inside the level. Those structures help them with sorting the orders.

Sorting system

The main goal of the game is to sort incoming packages and deliver them to the right people. You, the player,  will expand your sorting facility as you progress through the game. The bigger the sorting facility, the more you will need to sort.

Manufacturers

You purchase licenses to sell items from the manufacturers. These licenses can be upgraded to receive better items from the manufacturers. It is important to remember that it is the buyers that pick what they wish to order. You are only the middleman.

Satisfying customers

By sorting the items into the right places and delivering the orders, you earn money. Those can be used to expand the facility and upgrade your manufacturers.

Plot

You play as a quartermaster operating his magic wagon in a fantasy land. You come to the possession of this wagon after finding it in an enchanted forest. The magic inside the caravan makes one room almost endless. You, the quartermaster, decide to use this valuable tool to help provide for the fighters on the battlefield.

Goal

Your goal is to create a systematic sorting facility to optimally sort any incoming packages into the right places so they can be delivered to the right people. 

Message from developer: "Have fun and happy sorting"

Disclaimer: The game is currently in development. The game is designed and scripted by a single person as a final major project for a university module. 

The current state of production is "BETA". Please feel free to play the game at your own pace and fill in the forms as you go.
